General.Name: Founder Holdings Limited
General.Description: Founder Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the software development, system integration, and information products distribution activities in Mainland China, Hong Kong, and internationally. It engages in the property holding business. Founder Holdings Limited is headquartered in Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong.
General.Address: Cable TV Tower, Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong
